item.description:
Click here for a flyer!

THE GREATER WORCESTER HUMANISTS invite all New England Atheists,
Humanists, and Freethinkers to join them for their annual Summer Outing at Rutland State Park. All friends and family are welcome.

The field day will begin at noon, and last until 5 PM. Guests are encouraged to bring sports and game gear, and are asked to contribute to the potluck buffet.

Rutland State Park has more than 300 acres of walking/biking trails and also a pond for swimming. The GWH has reserved the use of the main pavillion for this event. Parking is $5. For directions and more information about the facilities, visit http://mass.gov/dcr/p....

RSVP here, at the GWH Meetup page, or by emailing Kara Wilson at worcesterhumanists@yahoo.com.
item.name: 4th Annual Greater Worcester Humanists Summer Field Day
